products.name: Organic Tortilla Chips
products.categories: Snacks, Salty snacks, Appetizers, Chips and fries, Crisps, Corn chips
products.facts: ["Made from organic corn, ensuring no synthetic pesticides or fertilizers are used.","The production process supports sustainable farming practices, promoting ecological balance.","Packaged in recyclable materials to reduce environmental impact.","Contains no artificial preservatives or flavors, maintaining high quality and natural taste."]

products.name: Origional (1/3 Less Fat Cream Cheese)
products.categories: Dairies, Fermented foods, Fermented milk products, Cheeses, Cream cheeses
products.packaging: Discard Seal, Rinse Tub & Replace Lid Check Locally PLASTIC TUB *Not recycled in all communities how2recycle.info
products.facts: ["Contains 1/3 less fat than regular cream cheese, making it a lower-calorie option.","Made with real cream cheese, ensuring a creamy texture and authentic flavor.","Packaged in recyclable materials to reduce environmental impact.","Produced with quality ingredients, free from artificial preservatives and flavors."]

products.name: Diet Coke
products.facts: ["The bottle is made from PET plastic, which is recyclable.","Diet Coke contains no calories or sugar, making it a low-calorie beverage option.","The production of Diet Coke aims to reduce water usage and improve sustainability practices.","Diet Coke is often packaged in a way that minimizes waste, promoting recycling and reuse."]

products.name: Red bull
products.categories: Beverages, Carbonated drinks, Sodas, Power Drink
products.facts: ["Red Bull cans are made from 100% recyclable aluminum.","The production of Red Bull has a commitment to reducing carbon emissions and energy consumption.","Red Bull sources its ingredients from sustainable suppliers to ensure quality and environmental responsibility.","The company supports various ecological initiatives and programs to promote environmental sustainability."]

products.name: Tajín Clasico Salsa en Polvo
products.categories: Plant-based foods and beverages, Plant-based foods, Condiments, Spices, Spice Mix, Groceries
products.labels: No gluten, No artificial additives, No colorings, No GMOs, Non GMO project
products.facts: ["TajÃ­n Clasico Salsa en Polvo is made from a blend of chili peppers, lime, and salt.","The product is gluten-free and contains no artificial preservatives.","TajÃ­n is committed to sustainable sourcing practices for its ingredients.","The packaging is recyclable, promoting eco-friendly disposal methods."]

products.name: Premier Protein chocolate shake
products.facts: ["Each 325 ml Premier Protein chocolate shake contains 30 grams of protein sourced from whey and casein.","The packaging is made from recyclable materials, promoting environmental sustainability.","Premier Protein shakes are low in sugar, containing only 1 gram per serving, making them a healthier choice.","The product is gluten-free and does not contain any artificial colors or flavors, ensuring high quality."]

products.name: White corn meal
products.categories: Plant-based foods and beverages, Plant-based foods, Cereals and potatoes, Cereals and their products, Flours, Cereal flours
products.facts: ["White corn meal is made from finely ground white corn, which is a variety of maize.","It is often used in gluten-free recipes and is a staple in many traditional cuisines.","White corn is typically grown in regions with warm climates, promoting biodiversity in agriculture.","High-quality white corn meal is rich in carbohydrates and provides essential nutrients like fiber and protein."]

products.name: Pre-cooked yellow corn meal
products.labels: Sin gluten, Kosher, Punto Verde, Fabricado en Italia, Sin aditivos
products.facts: ["Pre-cooked yellow corn meal is made from whole corn kernels that are cooked, dried, and ground into a fine powder.","It is often produced using non-GMO corn, making it a more sustainable choice for consumers concerned about genetically modified organisms.","The production of pre-cooked yellow corn meal typically involves minimal processing, helping to retain its natural nutrients and flavor.","This product is gluten-free, making it a suitable option for those with gluten sensitivities or celiac disease."]

products.name: Daisy 8oz Sour Cream
products.categories: Dairies, Fermented foods, Fermented milk products, Creams, Fermented creams, Sour creams
products.facts: ["Daisy 8oz Sour Cream is made from high-quality cultured cream with no artificial preservatives.","The packaging is recyclable, promoting eco-friendly disposal practices.","Daisy Sour Cream is gluten-free and contains no added hormones, ensuring quality and safety.","The product is made with simple ingredients, providing a clean label for consumers who prioritize natural foods."]

products.name: Unsalted Butter
products.categories: Dairies, Fats, Spreads, Spreadable fats, Animal fats, Milkfat, Dairy spread, Butters
products.facts: ["Unsalted butter is made from cream that is churned until it solidifies, with no added salt.","The production of unsalted butter can have a lower ecological footprint compared to salted butter, as it often requires fewer preservatives.","Quality unsalted butter is typically made from high-quality, pasture-raised cow's milk, ensuring better flavor and nutritional content.","Unsalted butter has a higher fat content (usually around 80%) compared to margarine, making it a preferred choice for baking and cooking."]
